title: Universal Grammar By Noam Chomsky | SLA #linguistics
description:
In this video I am going to talk about universal grammar by noam chomsky universal grammar mean a grammar which is acceptable in all ages our brain have already grammatical structure
So we cannot say that a brain is empty slate of a child
